bug.author: cheyang
bug.summary: Failed to use RocksDB in docker
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.1.0-SNAPSHOT
Follow the guide: <denchmark-link:https://docs.alluxio.io/os/user/stable/en/deploy/Running-Alluxio-On-Docker.html>https://docs.alluxio.io/os/user/stable/en/deploy/Running-Alluxio-On-Docker.html</denchmark-link> ,and try to change metadata store from to . <denchmark-code> docker run -d -p 19999:19999 --net=alluxio_nw --name=alluxio-master --hostname=alluxio-master -e ALLUXIO_JAVA_OPTS="-Dalluxio.master.hostname=alluxio-master alluxio.master.metastore=ROCKS " -v journal:/opt/alluxio/journal -v ufs:/opt/alluxio/underFSStorage alluxio/alluxio:2.1.0-SNAPSHOT master </denchmark-code>
The logs show: <denchmark-code>/entrypoint.sh: line 81: /usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8-openjdk/jre/lib/security/java.security: Permission denied </denchmark-code>
To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior (as minimally and precisely as possible) Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Urgency Describe the impact and urgency of the bug. Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.
